items.name: Ashen Creature
entries: When Jhaeros drops to 0 hit points, he explodes in a harmless cloud of ashes, leaving nothing else behind.

items.name: Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever Jhaeros is subjected to fire damage, he takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
